com.maverick.nio
Class Daemon

java.lang.Object
  com.maverick.nio.Daemon

public abstract class Daemon
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides an abstract daemon for servicing any number of protocol contexts.

Author:
Lee David Painter

          Constructs the Daemon.
